```{r}
  # load necessary libraries
  library(dplyr)
  # subset data to just 2023 by filtering the data column to strings with just "2023" as the first four characters
  # make Date column string type if it is not already
  Juneau$Date <- as.character(Juneau$Date)
  data_2023 <- Juneau[substr(Juneau$Date, 1, 4) == 2023, ]
  # display the first few rows of the 2023 data
  head(data_2023)
```
